com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.storage

Class EventStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow.tracker.storage.EventStore

  • public class EventStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for storing, getting and removing events from the SQLite database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      EventStore(Context context, int sendLimit)
      Creates a new Event Store
